title: Lesson 13 A new dress 一件新连衣裙
introduction: Listen to the tape then answer this question. What colour is Anna's hat? 听录音，然后回答问题。安娜的帽子是什么颜色的?

text_and_translation.text: LOUISE: What colour's your new dress?
text_and_translation.translation: 路易丝：你的新连衣裙是什么颜色的？

text_and_translation.text: ANNA: Come upstairs and see it.
LOUISE: That's a nice dress. It's very smart.
text_and_translation.translation: 路易丝：这件连衣裙真好，真漂亮。
安娜：我的帽子也是新的。

text_and_translation.text: ANNA: It's the same colour. It's green, too.
text_and_translation.translation: 安娜：一样的颜色，也是绿的。

text_and_translation.text: LOUISE: That is a lovely hat!
text_and_translation.translation: 路易丝：真是一顶可爱的帽子！

notes.title: What colour's
notes.describe: 是'What colour is'的缩写形式，常用于快速询问。

notes.title: Come upstairs
notes.describe: 表示动作指令，意为“上楼”。
